00048 void SPIINT_Configuration(void);

00050 void SPI_MainRoutine(void);
00051 u32 SPI_Process(HT_SPI_TypeDef * SPIx, u8 *buffer, u32 length);

00053 /* Global variables ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00054 vu32 guReceivedCount = 0;
00055 u8 guReceiveBuffer[8];
00056 vu32 gSPIINT = FALSE;
00057 u32 gIndex = 0xA0;

00060 /* Global functions ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00061 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00062   * @brief  Main program.
00063   * @retval None
00064   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00065 int main(void)
00066 {
00067   RETARGET_Configuration();           /* Retarget Related configuration                                     */
00068 
00069   SPIINT_Configuration();             /* SPI INT Related configuration                                      */
00070 
00071   SPI_Configuration();                /* SPI Related configuration                                          */
00072 
00073   while (1)
00074   {
00075     SPI_MainRoutine();
00076   }
00077 }
00078 
00079 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00080   * @brief  Configure the SPI INT ports.
00081   * @retval None
00082   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00083 void SPIINT_Configuration(void)
00084 {
00085   /* !!! NOTICE !!!
00086      Notice that the local variable (structure) did not have an initial value.
00087      Please confirm that there are no missing members in the parameter settings below in this function.
00088   */
00089   EXTI_InitTypeDef EXTI_InitStruct;
00090 
00091   CKCU_PeripClockConfig_TypeDef CKCUClock = {{ 0 }};
00092   CKCUClock.Bit.AFIO       = 1;
00093   CKCUClock.Bit.EXTI       = 1;
00094   HTCFG_INT_CLK(CKCUClock) = 1;
00095   CKCU_PeripClockConfig(CKCUClock, ENABLE);
00096 
00097   AFIO_GPxConfig(HTCFG_INT_GPIO_ID, HTCFG_INT_GPIO_PIN, AFIO_FUN_GPIO);
00098   GPIO_DirectionConfig(GPIO_PORT[HTCFG_INT_GPIO_ID], HTCFG_INT_GPIO_PIN, GPIO_DIR_IN);
00099   GPIO_PullResistorConfig(GPIO_PORT[HTCFG_INT_GPIO_ID], HTCFG_INT_GPIO_PIN, GPIO_PR_UP);
00100   GPIO_InputConfig(GPIO_PORT[HTCFG_INT_GPIO_ID], HTCFG_INT_GPIO_PIN, ENABLE);
00101 
00102   EXTI_InitStruct.EXTI_Channel = GPIO2EXTI(HTCFG_INT_GPION);
00103   EXTI_InitStruct.EXTI_Debounce = EXTI_DEBOUNCE_DISABLE;
00104   EXTI_InitStruct.EXTI_DebounceCnt = 0;
00105   EXTI_InitStruct.EXTI_IntType = EXTI_NEGATIVE_EDGE;
00106   EXTI_Init(&EXTI_InitStruct);
00107   AFIO_EXTISourceConfig(HTCFG_INT_GPION, HTCFG_INT_GPIO_ID);
00108 
00109   EXTI_IntConfig(GPIO2EXTI(HTCFG_INT_GPION), ENABLE);
00110   NVIC_EnableIRQ(EXTI_GetIRQn(HTCFG_INT_GPION));
00111 }
00112 
00113 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00114   * @brief  Configure the SPI ports.
00115   * @retval None
00116   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00117 void SPI_Configuration(void)
00118 {
00119   /* !!! NOTICE !!!
00120      Notice that the local variable (structure) did not have an initial value.
00121      Please confirm that there are no missing members in the parameter settings below in this function.
00122   */
00123   SPI_InitTypeDef SPI_InitStructure;
00124 
00125   CKCU_PeripClockConfig_TypeDef CKCUClock = {{ 0 }};
00126   CKCUClock.Bit.AFIO       = 1;
00127   CKCUClock.Bit.HTCFG_SPI_IPN = 1;
00128   CKCU_PeripClockConfig(CKCUClock, ENABLE);
00129 
00130   AFIO_GPxConfig(HTCFG_MASTER_SPI_SCK_GPIO_ID, HTCFG_MASTER_SPI_SCK_AFIO_PIN, AFIO_FUN_SPI);
00131   AFIO_GPxConfig(HTCFG_MASTER_SPI_SEL_GPIO_ID, HTCFG_MASTER_SPI_SEL_AFIO_PIN, AFIO_FUN_SPI);
00132   AFIO_GPxConfig(HTCFG_MASTER_SPI_MISO_GPIO_ID, HTCFG_MASTER_SPI_MISO_AFIO_PIN, AFIO_FUN_SPI);
00133   AFIO_GPxConfig(HTCFG_MASTER_SPI_MOSI_GPIO_ID, HTCFG_MASTER_SPI_MOSI_AFIO_PIN, AFIO_FUN_SPI);
00134 
00135   SPI_InitStructure.SPI_Mode = SPI_MASTER;
00136   SPI_InitStructure.SPI_FIFO = SPI_FIFO_ENABLE;
00137   SPI_InitStructure.SPI_DataLength = SPI_DATALENGTH_8;
00138   SPI_InitStructure.SPI_SELMode = SPI_SEL_HARDWARE;
00139   SPI_InitStructure.SPI_SELPolarity = SPI_SELPOLARITY_LOW;
00140   SPI_InitStructure.SPI_FirstBit = SPI_FIRSTBIT_MSB;
00141   SPI_InitStructure.SPI_CPOL = SPI_CPOL_LOW;
00142   SPI_InitStructure.SPI_CPHA = SPI_CPHA_FIRST;
00143   SPI_InitStructure.SPI_RxFIFOTriggerLevel = 1;
00144   SPI_InitStructure.SPI_TxFIFOTriggerLevel = 0;
00145   SPI_InitStructure.SPI_ClockPrescaler = 4;
00146   SPI_Init(HTCFG_MASTER_SPI, &SPI_InitStructure);
00147   #if (!LIBCFG_SPI_NO_MULTI_MASTER)
00148   SPI_SELOutputCmd(HTCFG_MASTER_SPI, ENABLE);
00149   #endif
00150   SPI_IntConfig(HTCFG_MASTER_SPI, SPI_INT_RXBNE, ENABLE);
00151   NVIC_EnableIRQ(HTCFG_MASTER_SPI_IRQ);
00152 
00153   SPI_Cmd(HTCFG_MASTER_SPI, ENABLE);
00154 }
00155 
00156 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00157   * @brief  SPI Main Routine.
00158   * @retval None
00159   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00160 void SPI_MainRoutine(void)
00161 {
00162   u8 SPIData[8];
00163   if (gSPIINT == TRUE)
00164   {
00165     gSPIINT = FALSE;
00166 
00167     SPIData[0] = gIndex++;
00168     SPIData[1] = gIndex++;
00169     SPIData[2] = gIndex++;
00170     SPIData[3] = gIndex++;
00171     SPIData[4] = gIndex++;
00172     SPIData[5] = gIndex++;
00173     SPIData[6] = gIndex++;
00174     SPIData[7] = gIndex++;
00175 
00176     if (SPI_Process(HTCFG_MASTER_SPI, SPIData, 8) != 8)
00177     {
00178       while (1); //Should not reached here. Means data overrun
00179     }
00180   }
00181   if (guReceivedCount == 8)
00182   {
00183     u32 i;
00184     printf("Received:");
00185     for (i = 0; i < 8; i++)
00186     {
00187       printf("%02x ", guReceiveBuffer[i]);
00188     }
00189     printf("\r\n");
00190 
00191     guReceivedCount = 0;
00192   }
00193 }
00194 
00195 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00196   * @brief  Send SPI Data.
00197   * @param  SPIx: SPI port
00198   * @param  buffer: buffer for data.
00199   * @param  length: data length (must <= 8).
00200   * @retval length
00201   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00202 u32 SPI_Process(HT_SPI_TypeDef * SPIx, u8 *buffer, u32 length)
00203 {
00204   s32 i;
00205   if (length > 8)
00206   {
00207     return 0;
00208   }
00209 
00210   if (8 - SPI_GetFIFOStatus(SPIx, SPI_FIFO_TX) < length)
00211   {
00212     return 0;
00213   }
00214 
00215   for (i = length; i > 0; i--)
00216   {
00217     SPI_SendData(SPIx, *buffer++);
00218   }
00219 
00220   return length;
00221 }
00222 
00223 #if (HT32_LIB_DEBUG == 1)
00224 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00225   * @brief  Report both the error name of the source file and the source line number.
00226   * @param  filename: pointer to the source file name.
00227   * @param  uline: error line source number.
00228   * @retval None
00229   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00230 void assert_error(u8* filename, u32 uline)
00231 {
00232   /*
00233      This function is called by IP library that the invalid parameters has been passed to the library API.
00234      Debug message can be added here.
00235      Example: printf("Parameter Error: file %s on line %d\r\n", filename, uline);
00236   */
00237 
00238   while (1)
00239   {
00240   }
00241 }
00242 #endif
